title: Sysoyevo
text:
Sysoyevo () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Posyolok Nikologory, <a href="Vyaznikovsky%20District">Vyaznikovsky District</a>, <a href="Vladimir%20Oblast">Vladimir Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 93 as of 2010.
Geography.
Sysoyevo is located 23 km southwest of <a href="Vyazniki%2C%20Vladimir%20Oblast">Vyazniki</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Priozyorny is the nearest rural locality.
